articles.content:
Mayor Steve Adler of Austin, Texas, has fully embraced the discovery of what blockchain technology and crypto payments can bring to his city by proposing two new initiatives.

articles.author: Larry Higgs | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Another fallen tree prevents NJ Transit rail line from returning to full service - NJ.com
articles.description: The Morris & Essex and Gladstone Branch lines will not return to full service Monday, a week after storm damage closed the line in Maplewood. Crews working on that issue had to remove another tree from the tracks in South Orange.
articles.content: Full service on the Morris & Essex lines and the Gladstone Branch will not return Monday as NJ Transit officials had hoped after bad weekend weather dropped another tree on the storm battered rai… [+3747 chars]

articles.title: 18-year-old charged with murder after shooting outside Raleigh McDonald's - WRAL News
articles.description: The Raleigh Police Department is investigating a shooting that happened outside a McDonald's in Raleigh Sunday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Amazon relocating 1800 employees out of downtown Seattle due to spiking crime - The Post Millennial
